page.title: 02Our School in Ryde
page.content: I am nine years old and attend{ {Caversham House School in Ryde.}We start school at five years old and leave at nine years old so I will be leaving soon. We have four classes.The lessons we have are{English,Maths {Music,Science,Nature,History,Geography {painting and P.E.}We do things on a Tuesday like{woodwork,sewing,making {puppets and cooking.}Our Head Teacher is called{Mrs.Lee.}On Thursdays and Fridays we have television.We start school at{9.00am}and we have play time at{l0.30am}then lunch at{12.00 noon} then we finish lunch at{1.30pm.}In the afternoon we have play at{2.45pm,}then we go home at{3.30pm.}Before the County Council bought our school it was a family house. Built in{1860}it is a very big house soon to be demolished and a new school built.
